alert.note: Alert for Upper Green River Basin; Upper Green River Basin Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued September 10 at 2:00AM MDT until September 10 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Frost and a light freeze. Low temperatures are expected to range between 28 and 32 degrees. Colder temperatures between 23 to 28 degrees are expected near Daniel and Bondurant. * WHERE...Upper Green River Basin. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 AM Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Recommended to disconnect garden hoses from their spigots.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Upper Green River Basin; Upper Green River Basin Foothills
